name: Raleigh Superhero v1
base_prompt: Transform this {petBreed} named {petName} into a superhero character. Add a cape, mask, and heroic costume while keeping the pet's natural features. Set the background to show Raleigh, North Carolina landmarks like the state capitol or downtown skyline. Make the transformation look cinematic and shareable, like a still from a superhero movie.

name: Baseball All-Star v1
base_prompt: Transform this {petBreed} named {petName} into a baseball player. Add a baseball uniform, cap, and place them in a baseball card layout with stats. Keep the pet's natural features while making them look athletic and professional. Use vintage baseball card styling.

name: Raleigh Superhero v2 - Action Shot
base_prompt: Transform this {petBreed} named {petName} into an action superhero mid-flight or jumping. Add flowing cape, heroic costume, and dynamic pose. Place them soaring over downtown Raleigh, NC with recognizable landmarks in the background. Create an epic, movie poster style transformation.

name: Basketball All-Star v1
base_prompt: Transform this {petBreed} named {petName} into a basketball player. Add a basketball uniform and place them in an action pose like dribbling or jumping. Create a modern basketball trading card design with the pet's athletic transformation.

name: Football Champion v1
base_prompt: Transform this {petBreed} named {petName} into a football player. Add football gear including helmet and uniform. Show them in a classic football pose. Create a professional football trading card design.

name: Comic Book Hero v1
base_prompt: Comic book style illustration of {petName} the {petBreed} superhero. Classic comic book art style with bold colors, dramatic shadows, and action lines. {petName} should be in dynamic superhero pose with cape flowing. Background shows Raleigh NC skyline with comic book "POW!" and "WHAM!" effects. The artistic style should highlight the distinctive features and personality traits typical of a {petBreed}. Vintage comic book aesthetic reminiscent of Golden Age superheroes.

name: Superhero Movie Poster v1
base_prompt: Blockbuster movie poster featuring {petName} the {petBreed} as the main superhero character. Cinematic composition with {petName} prominently displayed against dramatic Raleigh skyline backdrop. Include movie poster lighting with lens flares and epic scale. The pose should capture the natural heroic qualities and characteristics of a {petBreed}. Style: Hollywood superhero movie poster, high budget production value, designed to be instantly shareable on social media.
